name: places/ChIJsZghLZpZwokRkZug0jAHYhI
adrFormatAddress: 936 Broadway, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: Moving is so stressful, but Flat Rate made it a smoother process from start to finish. I had my things in a storage unit with Flat Rate for over a year. Payments and communication were always consistent. Then I hired them to move all my things long distance and that was also a great experience. Shout out to Adil, Manny, and my mover for quick and easy communication. Flat Rate services are worth the money. Reliable, transparent, and professional. Thank you again for all your help!

text.text: Moving is so stressful, but Flat Rate made it a smoother process from start to finish. I had my things in a storage unit with Flat Rate for over a year. Shout out to Adil, Manny, and my mover for quick and easy communication. Flat Rate services are worth the money. Reliable, transparent, and professional. Thank you again for all your help!

originalText.text: This was our second move with Flat Rate, and more complicated than the first (multiple destinations). We worked with the Felix, Erick, and Alcon team!! Those guys were top notch!!! Efficient yet also caring about the personal items in a methodical way.  Particularly with the portion that was going to a storage unit, Felix even asked how i wanted the unit set up / organized and then did it just like that. There was a lot going on that day and they were truly prepared for anything! Very hard workers doing very hard work. Would definitely recommend and use again.

text.text: This was our second move with Flat Rate, and more complicated than the first (multiple destinations). We worked with the Felix, Erick, and Alcon team!! Those guys were top notch!!! There was a lot going on that day and they were truly prepared for anything! Very hard workers doing very hard work. Would definitely recommend and use again.

originalText.text: Excellent move. Quality all the way. The 2 guys were on time, worked promptly and neatly. Wrapped all my furniture very thoroughly and I was very impressed. Kept in touch with my during travel to other location. Great communication and excellent service. Stephan was truly a great person and worked very well with his helper. This is the second time I’ve used Flat Rate Moving and the value and price can’t be beat.

text.text: Excellent move. Quality all the way. The 2 guys were on time, worked promptly and neatly. Wrapped all my furniture very thoroughly and I was very impressed. Kept in touch with my during travel to other location. Great communication and excellent service. Stephan was truly a great person and worked very well with his helper. This is the second time I’ve used Flat Rate Moving and the value and price can’t be beat.

originalText.text:
We love FlatRate. Totally professional and modern moving company. From their people to their online systems (track your truck!) to the repeated check-ins to the speed and efficiency, they made an overwhelming situation manageable and survivable!

We moved from the UWS to the UN area after living in the same apartment for 20 years. We could not have done it as smoothly without these folks. We needed one day to start packing and partially load and a second day to pack more, load and move. Totally worth it.

Matt, the gentleman who came over to eyeball and estimate everything, was our first touchpoint and was also the very last (as we settled into our new apartment at the end of a long day!). He’s so good at his job!

And the movers themselves — wow. They worked hard and fast, but took care of every item they packed, from the fragile to the biggest pieces of furniture. The team foreman, Adelfo, was knowledgeable, friendly and a pro! Very impressive.

I would recommend them without hesitation. With a lot of enthusiasm, in fact!

I would recommend them without hesitation. With a lot of enthusiasm, in fact!

originalText.text: From the sales VP Dejon Reid  to Stephan’s moving team. They were all amazing. Great prices and awesome people.  You get up to the minute info on where your truck is. Emails regarding any info needed from us.  COI in a timely manner. And did all this in a weeks notice. They ensure everything is set in order  to have your move run smoothly.  And it did. Communication. From start to finish.   I highly recommend them for your office or residential moves. They are professional and an absolute pleasure to work with.
